<br>

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(webexercises)
```

```{r}
#| class: webex-box
#| echo: false
#| results: asis 
question <- "What does 'ETL' stand for?"
question_choices <- c(
    "Extract, Translate, Load",
    "Edit, Transform, Log",
    "Enhance, Transmit, Log",
    answer = "Extract, Transform, Load"
)
cat(question, longmcq(sample(question_choices)))
```
